attr.title: The Dead Prince
attr.desc: Play the role of a blood magic assassin fulfilling the pact his family made long ago. Use your assortment of magical abilities to sneak through bases, take down guards, and assassinate your target.
attr.inst:
Demo Game is included. But once you see how fun this game is and decide to buy it, get it off STEAM from here, https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810530/The_Dead_Prince/
To use the full version: In the Steam client, right-click on the game in your library and select 'Manage', then 'Browse Local Files' and Copy the game files into the port's 'thedeadprince/assets' folder,
Launching the full game for the first time may take a moment as it applies a patch, so just be patient.

To use the full version:
